modules.name: machine_learning
recommendedLiterature: K.P. Murphy. Probabilistic Machine Learning: An Introduction. The MIT Press, 2022
I. Goodfellow, Y. Bengio, A. Courville. Deep Learning, The MIT Press, 2017
Additional material and articles provided in lecture notes
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Knowledge of probability and statistics, no attempted or completed IE 675 exam

modules.name: deep_learning
recommendedLiterature: I. Drori. The Science of Deep Learning. Cambridge University Press, 2023
I. Goodfellow, Y. Bengio, A. Courville. Deep Learning, The MIT Press, 2017
K.P. Murphy. Probabilistic Machine Learning: An Introduction. The MIT Press, 2022
K.P. Murphy. Probabilistic Machine Learning: Advanced Topics. The MIT Press, 2023
Additional material and articles provided in lecture notes
modules.additionalPrerequisite: No attempted or completed IE 674 exam

modules.name: advanced_process_mining
recommendedLiterature: Wil van der Aalst: Process Mining: Data Science in Action, 2nd edition (Recommended)
Josep Carmona et al. Conformance checking, 1st edition (Recommended)
Additional academic papers suggested per lecture
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Familiar with the use of Petri nets and BPMN, basic programming in Python

modules.name: web_data_integration_project
recommendedLiterature: AnHai Doan, Alon Halevy, Zachary Ives: Principles of Data Integration. Morgan Kaufmann, 2012.
Luna Dong, Divesh Srivastava: Big Data Integration. Morgan & Claypool, 2015.
Ulf Leser, Felix Naumann: Informationsintegration. Dpunkt Verlag, 2007.

modules.name: web_mining_project
recommendedLiterature: Bing Liu: Web Data Mining. 2nd Edition, Springer, 2011.
Wouter de Nooy, et al.: Exploratory Social Network Analysis with Pajek. 2nd Edition, Cambridge University Press, 2011.
Bing Liu. Sentiment Analysis and Opinion Mining, Morgan & Claypool Publishers, 2012.
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Programming skills in Java or Python.

modules.name: large_language_models_and_agents
recommendedLiterature: Zhou et al.: A Comprehensive Survey on Pretrained Foundation Models: A History from BERT to ChatGPT. 2023.
Zhao et al.: A Survey of Large Language Models. 2024.
Wang et al.: A Survey on Large Language Model based Autonomous Agents. 2024.
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Programming skills in Python, Basic machine learning concepts and techniques
